::: {.proj-title}

Diversity-Hire Narrative: Impacts and Mitigation Strategies

:::

::: {.proj-description}

*Christopher Perdriau, Vidushi Ojha,* ***Kaitlynn T. Gray,*** *Brent Lagesse, Colleen M Lewis*

:::

::: {.proj-description}

A project researching the diversity-hire narrative - the belief that someone received a job due to a part of their identity and not their skill. Explored who said this narrative, how it impacted those who heard it, and ways to prevent harmful effects from hearing this narrative. Published in ICER '23.

:::

:::{.project-links}
[Publication](https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/3568812.3603479) 
[Summer Research Poster](resources/DiversityHireNarrative.pdf) 
:::

:::
